about_the_game: Freezer is a robot with the ability of freezing rivals! use your powerful laser to throw away players or freeze them! , use your crio shot to slowdown them! freeze all the environment to reduce the speed of all the rivals!
detailed_description: Freezer is a robot with the ability of freezing rivals! use your powerful laser to throw away players or freeze them! , use your crio shot to slowdown them! freeze all the environment to reduce the speed of all the rivals!
name: SHOOTER LEAGUE - Freezer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 750 ti or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5 8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Freezer is a robot with the ability of freezing rivals! use your powerful laser to throw away players or freeze them , use your crio shot to slowdown them! freeze all the environment to reduce the speed of all the rivals!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support
